name: My Name is Bob McDiggs
description:
----My Name is Bob Mc Diggs ----

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Play as Bob Mc Diggs through several levels to help him gather everything he needs and flee this zombie infested rathole of a town once and for all !

Kill zombies with crowbar, shoot or stab them in the head, use beer and pills to stay in good shape and focus on finding the key elements Bob will need to survive his trip ! 

"DEV" SIDE NOTE :

My very first video/minigame ! I've done lessons and exercises and been learning C# and Unity on my own for about a year now. The goal was for me to try and see what I could do, and finally finish a projec. Although it took me 10 weeks to "finish" it (which is probably way too long), and my code might look like a tribute to Chaos to anyone brave enough to look at it, I'm quite happy with the result nonetheless. I plan on fixing a few things here and there depending on the feedback and future personal tests, then move on to something else to keep on learning.

Known bugs :

-Stamina amount sometimes flies over the top.

-End of level triggers are weird .

- Bob's Radio trigger is weirder.

- End of game trigger is weirdest.

-Movements can still happen when they're not supposed to.

- The overall melee system is still quite clunky and probably not super fun.  Focus on gunplay instead.

- It is possible to break through invisible walls if you try hard enough.

I hope you will enjoy it anyways, I had lots of fun crafting these levels and features and learnt so many things (also a lot of frustation sometimes, let's be honest !)

Overall a great experience as a ""junior developper"", I hope it will still be interesting to play from the player's perspective. Leave a comment if you feel like it, that will be much appreciated. Cheers !

Paul of the Dead

PS : the cat's named Nephtys, but you can call her Bibounette.
